title: Context-Based Personalized Science Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Project-based learning utilizing digital tools in a BYOD environment, where students integrate personal learning experiences both inside and outside the classroom

learning_goals: Learners can design over three personalized learning pathways connecting real-life problems to scientific concepts.
Learners can produce at least two learning experience reconstruction reports through peer feedback and mentoring.
Learners can systematically document their learning processes with over five evidence-based artifacts using digital portfolios.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
